actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction from gross income for certain social security taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employees subject to social security taxes an income tax deduction from gross income for all such taxes paid.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction from gross income for certain social security taxes.
